meanings.sent1: The archaeologists uncovered ancient superstrata during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The superstrata of clouds floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The superstrata of toppings on the pizza made it look like a delicious mountain.
meanings.sent4: The superstrata of stars in the night sky twinkled like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The superstrata of leaves on the forest floor created a colorful carpet.

meanings.definition: A layer or stratum above another.
meanings.sent1: The superstrata of frosting on the cake was thick and sweet.
meanings.sent2: The superstrata of dust on the shelf needed to be cleaned.
meanings.sent3: The superstrata of icing on the cupcake looked like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: The superstrata of paint on the wall was peeling off.
meanings.sent5: The superstrata of snow on the mountain glistened in the sunlight.
